p: Outcomes and clinical trajectories in the decision-tree-identified clusters were compared. Patients in Cluster 2, a sclerotic phenotype with ▲Joint +7, Fascia +5, Sclerosis +4, ▼ Mouth −5, Liver −10, accounting for 10% of patients, had a significantly longer time from stem cell transplantation to chronic GvHD onset (log-rank: P<0.0001) ( Figure 5).
